Subject: Scheduled Maintenance Notification: SCE11 PTL interfaces deployment on PROD

Scheduled Maintenance Notification: SCE11 PTL interfaces deployment on PROD

______________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________

To ensure business continuity, we are deploying SCE11 interface changes required for the implementation of PTL (Pick to Light) project in DIP warehouse.

 

During this activity, the WMS services (SCE11 and WM9)  will be temporarily unavailable.

 

Wednesday 16 October 10:00 PM GST â€“ 12 Midnight

If you require assistance during this time, kindly raise a support ticket via the following  link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C7de56fc21c524ef17c3c08dcede8efed%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638646833135200979%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=i6aJxCuQQ2NFs5%2FucvVsh%2FZEbeMfmjhiIar3v0pCIyY%3D&reserved=0>
